advanced instalation subtitle.defaults: This configuration will allow you customize your build selecting the components you want to use (only incluying the code for the component you use) and customize Bulma using sass variables

create a _variables sass file.defaults: To enable the advance setup first create a file named _variables.sass somewhere in your project. (we recommend on your src folder).

advanced instalation description.defaults: Now depending of the Framework of your choose the configuration may vary a little, here you can find instructions of how to configure it on the most used Frameworks
